description.value:
You channel the inner dragon at the peak of your zealous spirit and let loose a spiritual breath or carve a slash of divine power with your weapon. Spend your Zeal, and creatures in a 30-foot cone from you need to make a basic Reflex saving throw against your class DC. The effect of this Zenith is dependent on the amount of Zeal spent:

  • 1-2 Zeal: 1d6 spirit damage

  • 3-4 Zeal: 2d6 spirit damage

  • 5 Zeal: 2d6 spirit damage, and an additional 1d6 persistent spirit damage on a critical failure

Special: If you are aligned to a particular type of dragon, such as through a draconic exemplar or bloodline, you can choose to deal damage matching their listed breath damage type instead of spirit damage.

Level (+2) The damage and persistent damage increases by 1d6.
